page.title: 14The Sports Club. N.Runcton.
page.content: There is a private sports club with extensive playing fields and its own clubhouse at North Runcton.{Hockey, {Cricket,}and{tennis}are played there. The club is the leading sports club in{West Norfolk}and most of its members are from outside the village, particularly from Kings Lynn. There are about 150 hockey playing members, about 150 tennis players, and about 50 cricketers. Only about 25 members live in the village but any villager can use the club's facilities on a wednesday evening. The club employs a cleaner, a groundsman, and a tea-lady, each of whom live in the village. The club was set up at North Runcton,rather than elsewhere in West Norfolk simply because there was a suitable field available there.
